What information does the `getblockdeltas` command return about a block?

The `getblockdeltas` command returns a JSON object with the following information about the block:

* `hash`: the block ID (a string)
* `confirmations`: the number of confirmations (a numeric value)
* `size`: the block size in bytes (a numeric value)
* `height`: the block height (a numeric value)
* `version`: the block version (a numeric value)
* `merkleroot`: the block Merkle root (a hexstring)
* `deltas`: an array of transactions in the block, each with information about the transaction's inputs and outputs
* `time`: the block timestamp (a numeric value)
* `mediantime`: the average timestamp of the most recent blocks (a numeric value)
* `nonce`: the block nonce (a hex string)
* `bits`: the block bits (a hex string)
* `difficulty`: the current difficulty (a numeric value)
* `chainwork`: the total amount of work in the active chain (a hex string)
* `previousblockhash`: the hash of the previous block (a hex string)
* `nextblockhash`: the hash of the next block (a hex string)

getblockdeltas "blockhash"Returns information about the given block and its transactions.WARNING: getblockdeltas is disabled. To enable it, restart zcashd with the -experimentalfeatures and -insightexplorer commandline options, or add these two lines to the zcash.conf file:experimentalfeatures=1 insightexplorer=1Arguments: 1. "hash"     (string, required) The block hashResult: {  "hash": "hash",       (string) block ID  "confirmations": n,     (numeric) number of confirmations  "size": n,          (numeric) block size in bytes  "height": n,         (numeric) block height  "version": n,        (numeric) block version (e.g. 4)  "merkleroot": "hash",    (hexstring) block Merkle root  "deltas": [   {    "txid": "hash",     (hexstring) transaction ID    "index": n,       (numeric) The offset of the tx in the block    "inputs": [        (array of json objects)     {      "address": "taddr", (string) transparent address      "satoshis": n,    (numeric) negative of spend amount      "index": n,     (numeric) vin index      "prevtxid": "hash", (string) source utxo tx ID      "prevout": n     (numeric) source utxo index     }, ...    ],    "outputs": [       (array of json objects)     {      "address": "taddr", (string) transparent address      "satoshis": n,    (numeric) amount      "index": n      (numeric) vout index     }, ...    ]   }, ...  ],  "time" : n,         (numeric) The block version  "mediantime": n,       (numeric) The most recent blocks' ave time  "nonce" : "nonce",      (hex string) The nonce  "bits" : "1d00ffff",     (hex string) The bits  "difficulty": n,       (numeric) the current difficulty  "chainwork": "xxxx"     (hex string) total amount of work in active chain  "previousblockhash" : "hash",(hex string) The hash of the previous block  "nextblockhash" : "hash"   (hex string) The hash of the next block }
